panels.title: LDAP operations rate

panels.title: LDAP requests rate

panels.description: Average number of records per second sent by the server to clients
panels.title: Entries sent rate

panels.title: Read wiaters

panels.description: Average amount of data sent by the server per second
panels.title: Data sent rate

panels.description: Average number of returned security-related errors, such as wrong passwords, invalid authentication methods, or higher security requirements
panels.title: Errors rate

panels.description: Available and used cache sizes of normalized DNs
panels.title: Normalized DN cache size

panels.title: Normalized DN cache tries/hits rate

panels.title: DB cache efficiency

panels.title: DB cache hits/tries rate

panels.description: Number of pages in the database cache
panels.title: DB cache pages

panels.description: Number of cache pages evicted per second
panels.title: DB cache pages eviction rate

panels.description: Average number of dirty pages written to disk per second by Berkeley DB using memp_trickle
panels.title: DB dirty pages trickle rate

panels.description: Number of transactions performed by server per second
panels.title: Transactions rate

panels.title: Active transactions

panels.title: Locks

panels.title: Locks request rate

panels.description: Average amount of data written to the transaction log per second
panels.title: Log write rate

panels.description: The number of times threads were forced to wait to acquire a region lock per second, split by region type
panels.title: Regions wait rate

panels.title: Scrape duration

panels.description: Success rate of collecting metrics by collectors. 1 - successful, 0 - unsuccessful
